login.title: Welcome back
login.subtitle: Sign in to keep work flowing.
login.defaultError: Unable to log in. Check your credentials.

register.title: Create account
register.subtitle: We will auto-approve your email if it matches the workspace allow list.
register.subtitleBootstrap: No users exist yet. This account will become the workspace super user.
register.inviteInvalid: Invite code is no longer valid.
register.defaultError: Unable to register. Try a different email.
register.verifyEmailMessage: Thanks! Check your inbox to verify your email before signing in.
register.pendingApproval: Thanks! Your account is pending approval from an administrator.
register.unableToLoadInvite: Unable to load invite details right now.

inviteRequired.title: Invite required
inviteRequired.subtitle: Public registration is not available. Please ask an existing member for an invite link to join.

forgotPassword.title: Reset password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter the email tied to your account. We'll send a reset link if it exists.
forgotPassword.sent: If that account exists, a reset link is on its way to your inbox.
forgotPassword.error: Unable to send reset email. Try again later.

resetPassword.title: Choose a new password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter and confirm your new password to continue.
resetPassword.subtitleInvalid: This link is invalid. Request a new one.
resetPassword.missingToken: Reset link is missing. Use the email link again.
resetPassword.error: Unable to reset password. The link may have expired.

verifyEmail.title: Email verification
verifyEmail.success: Email verified! You can sign in now.
verifyEmail.error: Verification link is invalid or expired.

oidcCallback.title: Signing you in…
oidcCallback.subtitle: Hold tight while we finish authenticating your account.

connectServer.title: Connect to Server
connectServer.subtitle: Enter the URL of your Initiative server to get started.
connectServer.serverUrlHelp: Enter the base URL of your Initiative server
